message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping for a price closer to $10,000. Would you be able to accommodate this?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $10,000 is significantly lower than what I need to make this worthwhile.  I'm willing to come down a bit more, how about $12,500? This is still a great value for you considering the product's worth.
